data.name: Absented Age: Squarebound - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
* This soundtrack has the same contents as the international version's.

This is the original soundtrack of Absented Age: Squarebound (AbsentedAge:アブセンテッドエイジ ～亡霊少女のローグライクアクションSRPG -幽玄の章-).
22 track mp3 files featuring Karen, Hayato, and Suzu a.k.a. "Sado Band Club."

data.short_description: This is the original soundtrack of Absented Age: Squarebound featuring Karen, Hayato, and Suzu a.k.a. "Sado Band Club."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 player is needed to play the soundtrack.
